title: Commercial uses up to 20% of Zonal (basic) FSI, in addition to uses permissible in hotel i
clause_text: Commercial uses up to 20% of Zonal (basic) FSI, in addition to uses permissible in hotel i.e. banquet hall, conference hall and meeting room etc. shall be permissible.
section: 33(4) Building of Residential Hotels on independent plot:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Commercial uses up to 20% of Zonal (basic) FSI, in addition to uses permissible in hotel i.e. banquet hall, conference hall and meeting room etc. shall be permissible.
